channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39308|2024-08-04T02:06:41.912Z -- woocommerce%20myghpay%20payment%20gateway -- woocommerce%20myghpay%20payment%20gateway
item.description: The WooCommerce myghpay Payment Gateway WordPess plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the clientref parameter found in the ~/processresponse.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.0.
